metadata.creator: Con Artists
metadata.description:
Scavenge, shoot and survive your way through Union City in this sprawling zombie action RPG. Play in Survivor mode for a more realistic experience where the need food and sleep will be added to your survival requirements. Or play in Run'n'Gun mode and blast your way to freedom.

Controls

A,D - Left / Right
W - Jump
S - Crouch
Shift - Sprint

R - Reload
F - Flashlight
E - Activate
G - Give Weapon / Save Companion

Tab, B, I - Open inventory
C - Open Character Sheet
metadata.subject: Armor Games; Flashgames; Ruffle.rs; Emulation; Newgrounds; Flash; Zombies; Videogame
metadata.title: the-last-stand-union-city
metadata.notes: The Last Stand: Union City, often abbreviated as TLS:UC or UC, is the third game in The Last Stand series. It was released on July 20, 2011 on Armor Games, September 25, 2011 on Kongregate, and September 27, 2011 on Newgrounds.
